external_references.description: Terefos, A. (2020, November 18). TA505: A Brief History of Their Time. Retrieved July 14, 2022.

description: [TA505](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0092) has used a variety of tools in their operations, including [AdFind](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0552), [BloodHound](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0521), [Mimikatz](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0002), and [PowerSploit](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0194).(Citation: NCC Group TA505)
